notes:
Is the boss of Warlord level Pit #1.
[[Darakan the Executioner|Next #2.]]
name: Webster
strategy:
To all vocations you don't need to be diagonal with this monster.
Druid or Sorcerer: Use [[Magic Shield]] and [[SD]] or just [[Energy Strike]] and heal.
Knight: Melee and [[Exori]] or [[Exori Hur]].
Paladin: Shoot and [[Divine Missile]].
